Package com.sencha.gxt.chart.client.chart.axis

Class Summary
Axis<M,V> Defines axis for charts.
AxisToolTipConfig<M> Configuration for a Axis tooltip.
CartesianAxis<M,V> An axis in Cartesian coordinates.
CategoryAxis<M,V> A type of axis that displays items in categories.
GaugeAxis<M> Axis to be used with GaugeSeries.
NumericAxis<M> An axis to handle numeric values.
RadialAxis<M,V> Axis to be used with RadarSeries.
TimeAxis<M> A type of axis whose units are measured in time values.
 

Enum Summary
RadialAxis.Display Enumeration of the display style of the radial axis.
